prompt: Design a vibrant feedback form with a gradient background (blue to green) and white accents. Include a large 'We Want Your Feedback!' title at the top in a bold, playful font. Add a fun subtitle below in a smaller font. Arrange elements in a vertical layout: a name text field with a white border, an email field with validation, a dropdown for feedback type (Bug, Feature, General, Support) with a gradient border, a multi-line text area for comments with a white fill, and a horizontal 5-star rating system with white stars. Place a wide 'Submit Now' button at the bottom with a matching gradient background and white text. Use rounded corners and moderate spacing for a lively, engaging design.
